data.title: Chardam Package
data.subtitle: (Holy confluence, scenic surroundings and an aura of spiritual serenity make an ideal abode for the Gods and are a refreshing reward for the pilgrims who visit Chardham)
data.route: Delhi – Haridwar – Yamunotri – Gangotri – Kedarnath – Badrinath – Rishikesh – Delhi
data.nightStay: Haridwar (2N), Barkot (2N), Uttarkashi (2N), Guptkashi (2N), Kedarnath (1N), Badrinath (1N), Rudraprayag (1N)
